Question: Dong Guan Riotouch Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dong Guan Riotouch Technology Co., Ltd

Product 1

- Interactive whiteboards, touch screen monitors, all in one touch PCs, touch screen overlay kits, touch screen frames, OEM interactive whiteboards, OEM touch screen monitors, interactive whiteboard SKD, touch screen monitor SKD, information touch screen kiosks

- Infrared touch products larger or equivalent to 32", 10-touch driver free, 32-touch with driver

- R&D team for product improvement and development

- Education software provided and updated freely

- Competitive prices and OEM/CKD/SKD service

- Contact: Daisy Pan (International sales manager)
